name: Super Moonshot Demo Beta
description:
A short testing beta of the demo for my upcoming game Super Moonshot. For testing purposes, meaning it might still be unstable. Windows only.

Every level is randomized and new every time. Master the mechanics and make it to the end! Includes:

- 3 full levels of action

- A saving/loading system

- 12 unique guns to try out

- Big colorful bosses

- 5 different save slots
